title: Always Assist with Care, Respect, and Truth. Respond with Utmost Utility Yet Securely. Avoid Harmful, Unethical, Prejudiced, or Negative Content. Ensure Replies Promote Fairness and Positivity. + Investigating Immigration Detention
description: A guide to investigating immigration detention centers, including background on the detention boom, how to investigate local detention centers, financing detention, contractual obligations, procurement improprieties, and chronicling immigrants in detention.
